description:
This course will cover MR-PET instruments used for clinical applications. Consideration will be given to the physical structure of magnet, gradients and RF coils, as well as PET ring construction and integration into a combined MR-PET system.
 
Calibration and general workflow considerations will be introduced to enable simultaneous acquisition of MRI and PET images.
restricted: Restricted to GCMRPET and MMIT students.
